thread.title: PAC-MAN Mega Tunnel Battle: Chomp Champs Is A 64-Player Battle Royale Launching Next Month
thread.title_full: PAC-MAN Mega Tunnel Battle: Chomp Champs Is A 64-Player Battle Royale Launching Next Month

author: Kieron Verbrugge
title: PAC-MAN Mega Tunnel Battle: Chomp Champs Is A 64-Player Battle Royale Launching Next Month
text:
Bandai Namco has revealed that PAC-MAN Mega Tunnel Battle, its previously-Stadia-exclusive 64-player “battle royale” take on the arcade classic, is getting its
wider release on May 9th with the unnecessarily long title, PAC-MAN Mega Tunnel Battle: Chomp Champs.
Chomp Champs is headed to PS5, PS4, Xbox Series X|S, Switch and PC and will feature enhanced visuals over the Stadia version, along with new game modes, customisation options and new music. It’s also support cross-platform play and custom matchmaking along with a Ranked mode and global leaderboards.
In the game, players eat through a series of interconnected mazes in a bid to become the last PAC standing and crowned the “Chomp Champ.” Not only will players be able to directly chomp down on one another, but they can use power-ups, the environment and tactical guile to turn the iconic Ghosts onto their opponents.
Pre-orders are open now, and it’ll come in both Standard ($29.95) and Deluxe ($44.95) editions, with all pre-orders getting the Chomp Challengers DLC bonus. The Deluxe Edition comes with two more DLC packs and seven days early access.
You can check out a
pre-order trailer for PAC-MAN Mega Tunnel Battle: Chomp Champs below:
